Question module¶

For creating question you can use the Question class:

class Question.Question(question_num: int, question, answer_options: dict)¶

Question class is used for representing a question

Attributes

Parameters:

  • question_num (int) -- number of question

  • question (string) -- question

  • answer_options (dict) -- dict with possible variants of answers

  • AnswerException (class) -- custom exception for Answer class

Methods

print_question()

Prints question to output

ask_answer()

Asks answer from respondent

exception QuestionException(message)¶

Custom exception for Question inherited from Exception

Attributes

Parameters:

message (string) -- exception message

ask_answer()¶

Asks answer from respondent

Returns:

the Answer object class

Return type:

Answer

print_question()¶

Prints question to output

Raises:

Answer.AnswerException -- if answer options are missing

Voight-Kampff test
